type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.eclipse.EclipseJavaSourceSettings
type.description: * Describes Eclipse Java source settings for compiling and running some Java source code. * * @since 2.10

method.name: getJdk
method.description: * Returns the JDK used for building. * * @return The JDK. Never returns {@code null}. * @throws UnsupportedMethodException For provider Gradle versions older than 2.11, where this method is not supported. * @since 2.11

method.name: getSourceLanguageLevel
method.description: * Returns the Java source language level. * * @return The source language level. Never returns {@code null}.

method.name: getTargetBytecodeVersion
method.description: * Returns the target bytecode level. * * @return The target bytecode language version. Never returns {@code null}. * @throws UnsupportedMethodException For Gradle versions older than 2.11, where this method is not supported. * @since 2.11

property.name: jdk
property.description: * Returns the JDK used for building. * * @return The JDK. Never returns {@code null}. * @throws UnsupportedMethodException For provider Gradle versions older than 2.11, where this method is not supported. * @since 2.11

property.name: sourceLanguageLevel
property.description: * Returns the Java source language level. * * @return The source language level. Never returns {@code null}.

property.name: targetBytecodeVersion
property.description: * Returns the target bytecode level. * * @return The target bytecode language version. Never returns {@code null}. * @throws UnsupportedMethodException For Gradle versions older than 2.11, where this method is not supported. * @since 2.11
